cards.rules_text:
Vigilance, reach, trample
Whenever you cast a spell with mana value greater than Grunt, the Triumph of Steel's power, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

Menace
Whenever a permanent enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay 1 life. If you do, untap target nonland permanent you control.

Flying
When Maegathrax, South of Heaven enters the battlefield, you may pay X life. If you do, return target creature card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
Thrash [i](Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a stun counter on it. If you do, trigger its enters the battlefield ability.)[/i]

Each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard gains helvete until end of turn. The helvete cost is equal to its mana cost. Create a 2/2 red and green Elf creature token.
Helvete {3}{R}{G} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard by sacrificing a creature and paying its helvete cost reduced by that creature's power. Then exile it.)[/i]

Whenever an instant or sorcery spell you control resolves, you may shred it. [i](To shred a card, exile it, then create a Saga enchantment token with “r{3}—You may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost.”)[/i]

Return target nonland permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped with two stun counters on it. It loses all abilities until your next turn. [i](If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)[/i]

cards.special_text:
[+1]: You may discard a card. If you do, draw a card. Then if you discarded a nonland card this way, create a tapped Treasure token.
[-2]: Choose target creature, instant, or sorcery card in your graveyard. You may cast that card this turn.
[-4]: You get an emblem with “Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, you draw a card and each opponent loses 1 life.”

cards.rules_text: Each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard has helvete. The helvete cost is equal to that card's mana cost. [i](You may cast those cards from your graveyard by sacrificing a creature and paying the helvete cost reduced by that creature's mana cost. If you cast a spell this way, exile it when it resolves.)[/i]

When Wayk, The Crimson King enters the battlefield, search your library for up to X nonland cards with mana value X or less, shred them, then shuffle. [i](To shred a card, exile it, then create a Saga enchantment token with “r{3}—You may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost.”)[/i]

At the beginning of combat on each player's turn, that player may shred a nonland permanent they control. If that player doesn't, they can't attack you this turn. [i](To shred a card, exile it, then create a Saga enchantment token with “r{3}—You may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost.”)[/i]
Target player exiles the top X cards of their library, where X is the greatest mana value among creatures you control. You draw a card for each card type among cards exiled this way.

When Frayed End of Sanity enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to target opponent unless they discard two cards.
Thrash [i](Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a stun counter on it. If you do, trigger its enters the battlefield ability. If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)[/i]
Whenever Avenger of Oronimos deals combat damage to a player, it deals damage equal to its power to any other target.
cards.flavor_text: [i]In the forests of the Dark Throne, ancient kvltists sharpen their blades patiently.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Vigilance
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on the creature you control with the least power.

{T}: Add {G} or {W}. Put a +1/+1 counter on Chord of Valor.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have Chord of Valor become a 0/0 Avatar creature with shielded until end of turn. [i](Prevent all damage that would be dealt to it.)[/i]

{T}: Add {G}.
{T}: Add {R}. Activate only if you control a Mountain or a Forest.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]Like a snake between two stones
It itches in your bones.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
{T}: Add {U}.
{T}: Add {W}. Activate only if you control a Plains or an Island.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]Is this the only path to glory?
If so then I won't go alone.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
{T}: Add {B}.
{T}: Add {U}. Activate only if you control an Island or a Swamp.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]We'll sing and dance and we'll find romance
As we stroll to the edge of the world.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
{T}: Add {R}.
{T}: Add {B}. Activate only if you control a Swamp or a Mountain.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]You are an angel heading for the land of sunshine
And fortune is smiling upon you.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
{T}: Add {W}.
{T}: Add {G}. Activate only if you control a Forest or a Plains.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]Worshiping at the altar of no one
Can't remember which god is my one.[/i]

cards.card_name: Idol of the Church of Shred
cards.rules_text:
{2}, {T}: Add {W}{W}, {W}{U}, or {U}{U}.
{3}{W}{WU}{U}: Put three +1/+1 counters on Idol of the Church of Shred. It gains flying. Activate only as a sorcery and only once.
Vigilance
cards.flavor_text: [i]For Wayk, Crimson King of the Church of Shred, no sculpture is too filigreed, no banquet too ostentatious. This quest for perfection extends beyond the mortal lives of the Church, their spirits still ornamenting works in their undeath.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Whenever Great Deceiver attacks, you may put a lore counter on target Saga you control.
cards.flavor_text: [i]She drifts softly through a starless, bible-black night, seeking to catch a single elusive harmony.[/i]

If it's your main phase, there is an additional combat phase after this phase, followed by an additional main phase. For each creature that attacked this turn, create a token that's a copy of it. Those tokens gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step.

{W}{U} CHURCH OF SHRED Enjoy the noodling prog lines as your shredded sagas tick down.
{U}{B} DARK DRUDGE Take your time as grunge beasts slowly wake from slumber.
{B}{R} THRASH HALLS Be aggressive. Your creatures can repeat their enter triggers on attack for added metal.
{R}{G} KVLT HELLS The true masters of black metal trade creatures to recast spells.
{G}{W} METAL MOUNT The call of real metal echoes loudly and demands your strongest creatures.
{W}{B} MORBID Permanents leaving the battlefield under your control enhances your plan.
{B}{G} TAPPED CREATURES Slumbering, alchemical, thrashing or otherwise, your tapped creatures all matter.
{G}{U} FEROCIOUS Power 4 or greater is the key to metal madness.
{U}{R} COUNTERS Lore and stun counters—Hate to see them go, love to watch them leave.
{R}{W} PARADOX Shredded cards and helvete spells help you to cast from outside of your hand.

{T}: Add {G} or {W}.
As The Metal Mount enters the battlefield, you may tap an untapped permanent you control. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {R} or {G}.
As The Kvlt Hells enters the battlefield, you may tap an untapped permanent you control. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {B} or {R}.
As The Thrash Halls enters the battlefield, you may tap an untapped permanent you control. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
As The Church of Shred enters the battlefield, you may tap an untapped permanent you control. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {U} or {B}.
As The Dark Drudge enters the battlefield, you may tap an untapped permanent you control. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

Brutal Architecture enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {B} or {R}. Put a +1/+1 counter on Chord of Aggression.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have Chord of Aggression become a 0/0 Avatar creature with menace until end of turn.

{T}: Add {U} or {B}. Put a +1/+1 counter on Chord of Despair.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have Chord of Despair become a 0/0 Avatar creature with flying until end of turn.

{T}: Add {W} or {U}. Put a +1/+1 counter on Chord of Complexity.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have Chord of Complexity become a 0/0 Avatar creature with vigilance until end of turn.

{T}: Add {R} or {G}. Put a +1/+1 counter on Chord of Passion.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have Chord of Passion become a 0/0 Avatar creature with trample until end of turn.

When Maegathrax, South of Heaven enters the battlefield, you may pay X life. If you do, return target creature card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
